About

I’m a passionate software developer from Moscow, Russia. Besides iOS development I spend a lot of time learning and sharing my knowledge by articles, public speaking and mentoring.

I’m lucky to work in a great team of talented developers at Avito. I spread my attitude towards the importance of Open Source and community evolving among them and other Moscow mobile developers. One of its outcomes is a regular podcast Podlodka, where we share our experience in architecture, engineering practices, lifehacks and other aspects of development.

Open Source Projects

  • fabricio - a handy wrapper for Fabric.io private API
  • Generamba - a flexible iOS code generator
  • Typhoon - the best choice for DI in Objective-C
  • The Book of VIPER - a collection of articles on building and maintaining the VIPER architecture
